title: Simple handgun
content:
+ **[error image not found]**
**Class:** -safe-Thaumiel-

**Description:**
The only notable thing about how this anomaly looks is the fact that it has the SCP foundation logo on it, as of 1972 no logos have been put on a weapon. 
Nothing else odd about its appearance has been discovered.

**Field use:**
-After many tests, we have deducted that it can hurt other SCPs that are not harmed by regular weapons.
-This gun's bullets seem exactly the same as those in our standard-use weapons.
-All Class-D personnel who were shot with it seemed to either pass out or die.
author: stylis
